meanings.definition: A volatile liquid used as an inhalation anesthetic.
meanings.sent1: The hospital used methoxyfluranes to help patients sleep during surgery.
meanings.sent2: Doctors carefully administered methoxyfluranes to the patient before the operation.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy clown accidentally inhaled methoxyfluranes and started giggling during the show.
meanings.sent4: The mist of methoxyfluranes enveloped the room, calming everyone inside.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of methoxyfluranes lingered in the operating theater.

meanings.sent1: The new anesthetic gas, methoxyfluranes, was very effective in numbing the pain.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on methoxyfluranes to ensure they had enough for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally knocked over a tank of methoxyfluranes, causing a funny scene in the clinic.
meanings.sent4: As the patient inhaled the anesthetic gas, methoxyfluranes, the world around them faded into a dreamlike state.
meanings.sent5: The gentle hiss of methoxyfluranes filled the room, signaling the start of the procedure.
